game.name: Get Up In The Night
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 망했다! 할아버지가 외계인에게 납치되었는데, 어떻게 해? 끝났어! 외계인이 할아버지에게 비인간적인 실험을 한다니, 어떻게 해결하지? "장바구니에 추가"를 클릭하여 구매를 완료하고 해결책을 얻으세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Damn! The old man has been kidnapped by aliens, what to do? Finished! The aliens are conducting inhuman experiments on the old man, how to solve it? Click "Add to Cart" to complete the purchase and get the solution!
